Equipment Actions.Action 1: Maul, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tusks, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Slashing and can curse with Lycanthropy

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Wereboar makes 2 attacks, only one of which can be with its Tusks

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is Humanoid
Abilities.Ability 2: Charge, If the Wereboar moves in a straight line towards a target and then hits with its Tusks, the target takes an extra Average 7 Slashing damage and can be knocked prone
Abilities.Ability 3: Relentless, If the Wereboar would be reduced to 0 HP, it can resist the damage if it's not strong enough and be reduced to 1 HP instead

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
